Reviews.Title: So far very pleased
Reviews.Author: Robb S Texas
Reviews.Content: I purchased this extended warranty for a tv that I purchased. It was a good price but I was reluctant to purchase it on line. I will say this, I received a phone call the very next day asking if I had any question about the policy, she was very nice and offered any assistance if I needed any, she emailed me the specifics of the contract and instructions on how to make a claim. Unfortunately we had to return the tv within a few days, when we called about a refund for the extended warranty they were very helpful and said no problem they are processing my refund now. Believe it or not I'm a pretty techy guy who has never ordered anything online, so far my experience with canopy and amazon has exceeded all of my expectations.Updated 9-14-2011...Received my full refund for this product, Thanks canopy for being easy to deal with and so understanding.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jason P Mayforth
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, I have not had to use it, so I would have to hold off until then to review.  But they have very good customer service and within a day after purchasing I received emails from there team in reference to my purchase and all the details of program.  I had contacted them before purchase to check on coverages and additional questions I had and they took the time to explain everything to me and made me feel totally comfortable about making this purchase for my tv.

Reviews.Title: Professional Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Loggia
Reviews.Content: Product: Canopy Protection Plan - 4 YearsI purchased a refurbished Panasonic Plasma from Amazon and needed a protection plan. After comparing prices and terms among various competitors, I decided on Canopy for several reasons, as outlined below.1. Customer Service - You will receive a call from Canopy several days after purchase ensuring your satisfaction. In addition, they will answer any question you have regarding the terms and conditions of the purchased plan.2. Applicability to Refurbished Items - After speaking with an Amazon Rep, Square Trade and Canopy seem to be the only competitors available. Unfortunately, Square Trade is currently unable to provide a protection plan more than 2 years for refurbished items. Canopy provides up to 4 years with the sole condition that the refurbished television include a manufacturers warranty (most manufacturers will still provide warranty to refurbished items, albeit at a shorter term).3. Terms - The terms are significantly more practical and useful than other protection plans. Canopy will attempt to fix your television, and if unable to do so within a particular price range, will provide a check in the amount of the protection plan range.Overall, Canopy seems to have professional customer service. I will update and/or change this review if/when I begin a claim.

Reviews.Title: Have not
Reviews.Author: Ronald Dillard
Reviews.Content: Have not had to use it yet Hope we never have to use it That would mean we have had troublr with the TV

Reviews.Title: It's good!
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought it , I have it . It's good.  4 years . Protection you want for your product you purchased.

Reviews.Title: Not used yet, but good so far
Reviews.Author: Milan
Reviews.Content: I haven't had to use this service, but I received a call to ensure my plan was registered. Hopefully I won't need to use this as I really like my TV, but I'm comfortable knowing I have the protection and anticipate a very helpful experience. So far I give 5 stars to promote the product and have no reason to knock the rating.

Reviews.Title: Hoping it pays off if needed
Reviews.Author: Sard "sard"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this warranty for a Sony KDL46EX645 46-Inch 1080p 120HZ Internet Slim LED HDTV.  They were very responsive in sending me the initial contact and agreement information right after my purchase.  I called them after 2 weeks because the TV went out.  They were very nice on the phone and easy to contact but their coverage only begins after the manufacturer's warranty.  They transferred me to Amazon returns and I was able to resolve my issue that way.  As far as a review of the actual Canopy Protection it's difficult for me to determine how they will do if the same type of thing occurs after the first year.  I will keep my fingers crossed.

Reviews.Title: Not porvided what advertised
Reviews.Author: Bill Bruder
Reviews.Content: The ad stated I would recieve a paper (hard) copy as well as be able to view on line.  After order was complete it stated only an online version was forthcoming.  I attempted to download the the online version but each time I only got blank pages.  Paper or hard copy is important as in four years many things can happen to computer storage and the like.  It's really not ethical to advertise one thing and not deliver.  Bill Bruder

Reviews.Title: Bad deal.  No deal.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Mottern
Reviews.Content: After repeated attempts, I have been unable to get a hard copy of the insurance policy...or protection plan...detailing what coverages are provided and other such normal information.Many promises; no action.  I would like to cancel this purchase and get a refund if possible. I have lost faith in their ability to provide the protection....whatever it is...in a satisfactory way.This was purchased as a gift to go along with my purchase from Amazon of a 55inch Samsung TV.  I cannot...and will not... recommend this company.

Reviews.Title: BEST DEAL ON THE NET!!
Reviews.Author: jr
Reviews.Content: I FOUND THE CANOPY PROTECTION PLAN FOR MY NEW LED 46" HD TV ON THE AMAZON WEBSITE WHEN PURCHASING THE TV.COMPARED TO OTHERS AVAILABLE, CANOPY WAS THE BEST DEAL - THE MOST FOR YOUR MONEY!! ALSO LOVED THE PART ABOUT THE IN-HOME REPAIR.THEN THEY CALLED ME THE NEXT DAY! HOW TERRIFIC IS THAT?HOPE I NEVER HAVE TO USE THE PLAN BUT I KNOW THAT IF I DO, I WILL BE MORE THAN SATISFIED.J RUBIN

Reviews.Title: Good Plan
Reviews.Author: Thorleif H. Floystad "Henry"
Reviews.Content: Althought I haven't used the plan, I anticipate good results of my TV fails.  Hope to never use it, however.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Sharon "Sharon"
Reviews.Content: I got a smokin deal on my 50" refurbished tv. By all appearances it looked brand new still in wrapper ect. Put that along with the 4 yr protection plan for an extra $100 for peace of mind I could not go wrong

Reviews.Title: A good idea
Reviews.Author: jaybee92345
Reviews.Content: I like the idea of a protection plan that goes beyond the basic insurance of the new product.  I like the idea of being able to call someone to come out for repairs when needed.  It was strange not getting any information from this organization besides the receipt and a phone number.  It makes me suspicious that I'm not sent an email with info or a mailed brochure that explains the details.  I've yet to see if it actually works.

Reviews.Title: Haven't used it yet
Reviews.Author: mtcrusher
Reviews.Content: I haven't had to use it yet so hopefully it holds up when I have a problem with the TV.

Reviews.Title: canopy
Reviews.Author: Chillo
Reviews.Content: I did not with them yet because I bought this insurance recently to protect my 47" Vizio TV and so far everything is okay.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: K. Johnson "The Glitchhawk"
Reviews.Content: Happy so far. Bought the plan separately but had no problem linking it to my TV on their website.Pros:+Easy+Quick+Peace of mind

Reviews.Title: Very straightforward
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Welsh
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as my last HDTV went out inside of 3 years so I thought I would purchase some added protection this go around.  The offer came up in conjunction with my purchase... I could have easily declined it but thought otherwise.  I got the contract terms shortly after and now have my new HDTV and the assurance of knowing it's gonna last me longer or else.

Reviews.Title: Coverage
Reviews.Author: oscar "oscar"
Reviews.Content: I know most financial sites will tell you not to bother but I purchased the plan because of the price and the in home repairs for a larger TV.  I have so far just received an email from them and won't really know how good it is till I have to use it.

Reviews.Title: Wow,what customer service
Reviews.Author: cigars222
Reviews.Content: First of all,I want to say I was a little nervous buying my flat screen online.I decided to get the protection plan.My thought was it was very CHEAP insurance.Within a couple of days I get a e mail and a phone call from Canopy.It was then I thought this company seems really good.This is like life insurance,you have it,hope you never need it but it gives you peace of mind.CHEAP MONEY

Reviews.Title: Warraty
Reviews.Author: Gloria "floglo"
Reviews.Content: Although I am giving this a 5star but the proof is the pudding, I will review later if and when I use it. otherwise this was very reasonable!

Reviews.Title: Havent needed it yet
Reviews.Author: Larry Carothers
Reviews.Content: Hard to rate until I have to use it, frankly I don't look forward to using it as the TV is working perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Seems like a great company!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I haven't had to use the repair service, but the company has taken the initiative and contacted me first. I been pleased with them so far.

Reviews.Title: TV protection plan invalid
Reviews.Author: Karl Buck
Reviews.Content: I note that I was sold a product pprotection plan for TV's between $900 and $1000.  Howeveer, I am sure you were aware that I paid $1400 for my TV, making my protection plan INVALID!!Please cancel my plan and refund my $$$ IMMEDIATELY.Charles Wittkoparizcw @ gmail.com

ProductInfo.Features:
Delivered by e-mail, register and file claims online or by phone
Surge protection starts when your product ships; mechanical and electrical failures are covered after manufacturer warranty expires
Covers 100% of parts and labor with no deductible, repaired or replaced in 3 days or less
Coverage includes free in-home service for larger TVs, free two-way shipping for smaller TVs
Fully transferable with gifts, cancel anytime, full refund in the first 30 days
ProductInfo.Name: Canopy 4-Year TV Protection Plan ($3000-$4000)
